name: Consent
title: Consent
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Community Based Collaborative Care)
description: A record of a healthcare consumer's choices, which permits or denies identified recipient(s) or recipient role(s) to perform one or more actions within a given policy context, for specific purposes and periods of time.

elements.name: Consent
elements.description: A record of a healthcare consumer's choices, which permits or denies identified recipient(s) or recipient role(s) to perform one or more actions.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Unique identifier for this copy of the Consent Statement.

elements.name: status
elements.description: Indicates the current state of this consent.

elements.name: scope
elements.description: A selector of the type of consent being presented: ADR, Privacy, Treatment, Research.

elements.name: category
elements.description: A classification of the type of consents found in the statement.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The patient/healthcare consumer to whom this consent applies.

elements.name: dateTime
elements.description: When this Consent was created or indexed.

elements.name: performer
elements.description: Either the Grantor, which is the entity responsible for granting the rights listed in a Consent Directive or the Grantee, which is the entity responsible for complying with the Consent Directive.

elements.name: organization
elements.description: The organization that manages the consent, and the framework within which it is executed.

elements.name: sourceAttachment
elements.description: The source on which this consent statement is based.

elements.name: sourceReference
elements.description: A reference to a consent that links back to such a source.

elements.name: policy
elements.description: The references to the policies that are included in this consent scope.

elements.name: policyRule
elements.description: A reference to the specific base computable regulation or policy.

elements.name: verification
elements.description: Whether a treatment instruction (e.g. artificial respiration yes or no) was verified with the patient, his/her family or another authorized person.

elements.name: provision
elements.description: An exception to the base policy of this consent.
